text:

author: Shondra Pena
text:
I am ENVIOUS of Ukraine.
A bizarre statement to make at this point in time, but understand that their Patriotic & strong LOVE for their FELLOW countrymen is how we, the UNITED States of America, used to be. Regardless of our issues, that was our belief. 
Now that is UKRAINE
